## Presenting revealjs Slides

|                          |                                                                            |
|:------------------------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|`f`                       | full screen mode (`esc` to escape)                                         |
|`s`                       | open Speaker View                                                       |
|`alt + click`             | zoom in                                                                    |
|`o`                       | overview mode                                                              |
|`e`                       | toggle back/forth to pdf export mode (then print to PDF with your browser) |
|`m`                       | toggle menu                                                                |
|`?`                       | see more tips                                                              |

::: {.notes}
If you can't remember these keyboard shortcuts, just click the menu button and go to 'Tools'.
:::
